Rise     Ashes

-- Mystery Man (2) --

Turnabout Goodbyes
Transcript

December 26, 9:44 AMDistrict CourtDefendant Lobby No. 2
Phoenix:
Karma...?
Edgeworth:
 '  right, Manfred von Karma.  '    best prosecutor    .   hasn'  lost   case     40-year career.       god   prosecution, Wright!   god!
Maya:
    single case?
Edgeworth:
 '    anything   get   guilty verdict, anything.
Phoenix:
Hmm. Sounds   someone else   know, Edgeworth.
Edgeworth:

December 27, 10:00 AMDistrict CourtCourtroom No. 3
Judge:
Court   now   session     trial   Mr. Miles Edgeworth.
Phoenix:
  defense   ready,   Honor.
Karma:
... ...
Judge:
Very well, apparently   prosecution   also ready.
Phoenix:
(Who     judge here, anyway!?)
Judge:
Mr. von Karma,   opening statement.
Karma:
... ...
Judge:
Er... very well, no opening statement  ...
Karma:
Objection!
Karma:
    fast, Judge!     taking   meaningful pause before speaking!
Judge:
R-right,   course.
Karma:
  prediction! Today'  trial   end three minutes   now!
Judge:
Order... order! Mr. von Karma!       meaning     statement just now!?
Karma:
Objection!
Karma:
Bah! Must   question everything!       over   three minutes!     no time   waste!  '  call   witness now!

R-right...

  call   witness...   decisive witness     stand!

( '    mysterious boat shop owner.)

  night     incident,         boat rental shop, correct?
